document.full_text: shaping cirque du soleil's new show, 'zarkana,' which opens in new york this week, involves trying to balance the tension between a circus and a rock opera.
document.title: arts & leisure: how do you make a whole show fly?
lines_and_colors: shaping cirque du soleil's new show, 'zarkana,' which opens in new york this week, involves trying to balance the tension between a circus and a rock opera.
